About the Game


The story continues where Hero by Chance left off. The fight against the Drogakan empire in the West goes on. This time, you will face the might of the empireâ€™s legions and many new interesting opponents. You have collected strong alliances but Drogakad is a force to be reckoned with and it does not forget your defiance in the past. You are the only person who can stand against its wrath and ambition. Therefore, sharpen your skills and lead your band of female warriors to the ultimate victory.

The empire is on its way:
Love n War: Hero by Chance II is a bigger improvement than Hero by Chance in every way
Many beautiful heroes with different personalities, purposes, and desires
Resource management & upgrades

Game Features:
Japanese voice-over for all the ladies
Many intense and strategic battles to fight
Engaging plot with twists and turns

Active heroes can now be deployed on the battlefield as individual units with unique abilities


The story is being greatly improved in all aspects


Some special units now have different branches. Choose the ones that suit your playstyle best


New siege battles

data.short_description: Love n War: Hero by Chance II is a tactical RPG with exciting battles and hot girls. The fight against the Drogakan empire goes on with a more sophisticated storyline this time. Build your economy, recruit gorgeous heroic girls, upgrade units, and immerse in stimulating love tales.
